member.name: T:SaltyBet.GameMode
member.summary: Determines the gamemode being broadcasted.

member.name: F:SaltyBet.GameMode.Unknown
member.summary: The game mode is not know at this time.

member.name: F:SaltyBet.GameMode.Matchmaking
member.summary: Fighters get picked at random for 1 on 1 matches.

member.name: F:SaltyBet.GameMode.Tournament
member.summary: Preselected fighters fight 1 on 1 in an elimination style tournament until 1 is left.

member.name: F:SaltyBet.GameMode.Exhibition
member.summary: Fights requested by viewers that can star any fighter they choose.

member.name: T:SaltyBet.NewMatchHandler
member.summary: Handles when a new match with new characters is created and the bets are open.
member.param: The current match being on display.

member.name: T:SaltyBet.MatchStartedHandler
member.summary: Handles when the new match has started and the bets are closed.
member.param: The current match being on display.
The total amount of salt bucks bet on the red team.
The total amount of salt bucks bet on the blue team.

member.name: T:SaltyBet.MatchFinishedHandler
member.summary: Handles when the match has been finished and bets are paid out.
member.param: The current match being on display.
The total amount of salt bucks bet on the red team.
The total amount of salt bucks bet on the blue team.

member.name: T:SaltyBet.GameModeStartedHandler
member.summary: Handles when a new game mode has started.
member.param: The game mode that has started.

member.name: T:SaltyBet.ISaltyBetClient
member.summary: A client used to listen to the match feed from saltybet matches.

member.name: M:SaltyBet.ISaltyBetClient.StartConnectionAsync
member.summary: Starts the client and listen to incoming messages.

member.name: M:SaltyBet.ISaltyBetClient.StopConnectionAsync(System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus,System.String)
member.summary: Stop listening to incoing messages.
member.param: Signals how the websocket has been closed.
The description of how the websocket has been closed.

member.name: M:SaltyBet.ISaltyBetClient.GetCurrentMatchStatus
member.summary: Gets the Match status from the moment the status was requested.
member.returns: The Match status from the moment the status was requested.

member.name: M:SaltyBet.ISaltyBetClient.AddOnNewMatchHandler(SaltyBet.NewMatchHandler)
member.summary: Adds the handler for when a new match with new characters is created and the bets are open.
member.param: The handler for when a new match is created.

member.name: M:SaltyBet.ISaltyBetClient.AddOnMatchStartedHandler(SaltyBet.MatchStartedHandler)
member.summary: Adds the handler for when the new match has started and the bets are closed.
member.param: The handler for when the new match has started and the bets are closed.

member.name: M:SaltyBet.ISaltyBetClient.AddOnMatchFinishedHandler(SaltyBet.MatchFinishedHandler)
member.summary: Adds the handler for when the match has been finished and bets are paid out.
member.param: The handler for when the match has been finished and bets are paid out.

member.name: M:SaltyBet.ISaltyBetClient.AddOnGameModeStarted(SaltyBet.GameModeStartedHandler)
member.summary: Adds the handler for when a new game mode has been loaded in.
member.param: The handler for when a gamemode has been loaded in.

member.name: M:SaltyBet.ISaltyBetClient.RemoveOnNewMatchHandler(SaltyBet.NewMatchHandler)
member.summary: Removes the handler for when a new match with new characters is created and the bets are open.
member.param: The handler for when a new match is created.

member.name: M:SaltyBet.ISaltyBetClient.RemoveOnMatchStartedHandler(SaltyBet.MatchStartedHandler)
member.summary: Removes the handler for when the new match has started and the bets are closed.
member.param: The handler for when the new match has started and the bets are closed.

member.summary: Removes the handler for when the match has been finished and bets are paid out.

member.name: M:SaltyBet.ISaltyBetClient.RemoveOnGameModeStarted(SaltyBet.GameModeStartedHandler)
member.summary: Adds the handler for when a new game mode has been loaded in.
member.param: The handler for when a gamemode has been loaded in.

member.name: T:SaltyBet.Match
member.summary: A snapshot of the current state of a match on saltybet.

member.name: P:SaltyBet.Match.Status
member.summary: The current status of the match.

member.name: P:SaltyBet.Match.GameMode
member.summary: The current game mode of the match.

member.name: P:SaltyBet.Match.TeamRedName
member.summary: The name of the team representing the red team.
member.remarks: During matchmaking and tournaments this is often the character being played.

member.name: P:SaltyBet.Match.TeamBlueName
member.summary: The name of the team representing the blue team.
member.remarks: During matchmaking and tournaments this is often the character being played.

member.name: P:SaltyBet.Match.MatchesUntilNextMode
member.summary: The ammount of matches until the next game mode gets loaded.

member.name: M:SaltyBet.Match.#ctor(SaltyBet.MatchStatus,SaltyBet.GameMode,System.String,System.String,System.Byte)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the class.
member.param: The current status of the match.
The current game mode of the match.
The name of the team representing the red team.
The name of the team representing the blue team.
The ammount of matches until the next game mode gets loaded.

member.name: M:SaltyBet.Match.IsSameMatch(SaltyBet.Match)
member.summary: Determines if two match snapshots come from the same match.
member.param: The other snapshot to compare it to.
member.returns: True if both match snapshots come from the same match.

member.name: M:SaltyBet.Match.IsSameMatch(SaltyBet.Match,SaltyBet.Match)
member.summary: Determines if two match snapshots come from the same match.
member.param: A snapshot from a match.
The other match snapshot to compare it to.
member.returns: True if both match snapshots come from the same match.

member.name: T:SaltyBet.MatchStatus
member.summary: Determines the status of the match.

member.name: F:SaltyBet.MatchStatus.Unknown
member.summary: The match's status cannot be determined.

member.name: F:SaltyBet.MatchStatus.TeamRedWon
member.summary: Player one won the match.

member.name: F:SaltyBet.MatchStatus.TeamBlueWon
member.summary: Player two won the match.

member.name: F:SaltyBet.MatchStatus.BetsOpen
member.summary: Bets can be placed on the current match.

member.name: F:SaltyBet.MatchStatus.BetsClosed
member.summary: Bets can not be placed on the current match as it has started.

member.name: F:SaltyBet.MatchStatus.Draw
member.summary: The match has ended in a state that has no winners either by two opponents being left with the same HP or a system reset.

member.summary: The HTTP client used to fetch the current state of saltybet.

member.name: P:SaltyBet.SaltyBetClient.CurrentMatch
member.summary: The latest match data received from salty bet.

The additional options to be applied to the underlying websocket.

member.summary: Starts listening to the websocket feed.

member.name: T:SaltyBet.SaltyBettingClient

member.name: P:SaltyBet.SaltyBettingClient.IsLoggedIn
